item.title: Why do women live longer than men? Study offers clues to close the gap
item.description: Women have an evolutionary advantage when it comes to living longer. They outlive men by about 5 years. This gender gap is true for many mammals, but ...

item.title: Amid funding cuts and public health battles, NIH issues autism research grants
item.description: Cornell University will receive $5.1 million as the Trump administration seeks to find a source and cure for autism.

item.title: With makeshift jump ropes and hide and seek, kids play to cope with crisis
item.description: From Gaza to Ukraine to South Sudan, children play to deal with the stress — and find a moment of joy.
